calculations.name: term Bucket
calculations.tableau_expression:
Case DATEPART('weekday',[title date])

WHEN 6 then

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if DATE([Maturity Date]) <= DATE([title date]) then "expired"  
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',4,[title date]) then "O/n" 
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"
END

Else 

if   DATE([Maturity Date]) <= DATE([title date]) then "expired"  
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) then "O/n"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"

END

END

ELSE 

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if  [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',2,[title date]) then "O/n"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"

END

ELSE

if  [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',1,[title date]) then "O/n"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"

END



END

END

calculation_context.Expression:
Case DATEPART('weekday',[title date])

WHEN 6 then

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if DATE([Maturity Date]) <= DATE([title date]) then "expired"  
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',4,[title date]) then "O/n" 
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"
END

Else 

if   DATE([Maturity Date]) <= DATE([title date]) then "expired"  
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) then "O/n"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"

END

END

ELSE 

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if  [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',2,[title date]) then "O/n"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"

END

ELSE

if  [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('weekday',1,[title date]) then "O/n"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',1,[title date]) then "1W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('week',2,[title date]) then "2W"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('month',1,[title date]) then "1M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',96,[title date]) then "3M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',189,[title date]) then "6M"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] <= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "1 Year"
ELSEIF [Maturity Date] >= DATEADD('day',371,[title date]) then "> 1 Year"

END



END

END

calculated_fields.title date: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [Max Date] ELSE  [Parameters].[End Date] END
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
